sinhala mawi piya depalakata dawa upan ma kuda kalama amimatath thaththatath karadara dun kellaki.sahodarayin dedenaku ha sahodariyan dedenaku samaga itha sathutin duppath jiwithayak gatha kalemi.eda wela kamata pawa nothibunu apahata,amima gedaraka wadak karagena ena bath patha ka wara ananthaya.kudawata thibu mati biththi niwasa api siwi denage maligaya wiya.kanna nathath api sathutin jiwath wunemu.ekese upan bawa kata pirennata amima guti bata dunnaya.ee kisiwakata nowe pasal yannath dath madinnatathya.niwase sara wadima daruwa ma bawa hamoma kiyannata gaththe mage kriyawan nisa wiya hakiya.ma kisiwakuta biya wuye natha.karana hama wadama pirisiduwata kirimata ma aාsa kalemi.niwase api sawoma dinen dina wadiwiyata piya naguwada duppathkama ethanama wiya.ma hata eya supurudu deyak bawata pathwi thibuni.wasara 12 wana wita ma maranaya langata gos nawatha pamini ayekmi.maleriya uwadura ma siwi warak wela gaththeya.me sama witama mage pihita mage raththaran amima wiya.usas adhyapanaya hadara wishwa widyalayata athulath wimata warami lada ma hata mage amima siyalu wiyadami sapaya dunnaya.
